item.title: Bangalore to Kovalam Solo Trip Plan
item.description: Solo trip from Bangalore to Kovalam offers a perfect blend of relaxation, beach vibes and cultural experiences. Here's a suggested itinerary for your solo trip: Route Bangalore -> Salem -> Madurai -> Tirunelveli -> Nagercoil -> Kovalam Bangalore to Kovalam Departure from Bangalore Start your journey early in the morning to make the most of your day. The distance between
